headline: CarMax (KMX): Assessing Valuation After Strong Quarterly Earnings and Sales Growth
summary: If you are eyeing CarMax (NYSE:KMX), you probably took notice of the company’s strong second-quarter report. Management revealed positive comparable retail sales and double-digit year-over-year growth in earnings per share. This suggests that CarMax’s earnings growth model still has momentum. This update was enough to pique interest across the market, especially as investors weigh how it may shape the company’s outlook in a competitive used car landscape. Despite the upbeat quarterly news,...
